text: Steffani Ethel Otiniano Torres (born 7 August 1992) is a Peruvian footballer who plays as a forward for Brazilian Série A1 club AS Minas ICESP and the Peru women's national team. ==International goals== Scores and results list Peru's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- ! title: Steffani Otiniano
